Apple Crumble

Called 'apple crisp' for the Americans out there.
American dessert
Yield:

Ingredients

filling

  • cups apples diced
  • cup sugar
  • tbsp flour
  • tsp cinnamon

topping

  • cup quick oats
  • cup brown sugar
  • cup flour
  • tsp baking powder
  • tsp baking soda
  • cup oil

Method

Preheat the oven at 350F.

Combine the ingredients for the filling in a bowl. Put in the pan.

Experiment with other fruits like peaches and pears! Will also be very tasty.

Combine the ingredients for the topping in the bowl. Put on top of the filling.

Bake for 45 minutes. Let cool for a bit after baking. Serve with vanilla ice cream if you feel bougie.
